65 
67  void clearLayout(QLayout *layout, bool deleteItems = true) {
68  QLayoutItem *item;
69  while ((item = layout->takeAt(0))) {
70  if (item->layout()) {
71  clearLayout(item->layout());
72  if (deleteItems)
73  //delete item->layout();
74  item->layout()->deleteLater();
75  }
76  if (item->widget()) {
77  if (deleteItems)
78  //delete item->widget();
79  item->layout()->deleteLater();
80  }
81  delete item;
82  }
83  }
